mapper.select: select a.admin_id adminId,a.username,a.password,a.salt, r.role_id roleId,r.role_name roleName, au.authority_id authorityId,au.authority_name authorityName from s_admin a left join s_admin_role ar on a.admin_id=ar.admin_id left join s_role r on ar.role_id=r.role_id left join s_role_authority ra on r.role_id=ra.role_id left join s_authority au on ra.authority_id=au.authority_id where username=#{username}
select admin_id adminId,username,password,salt from s_admin where username=#{username}
